result.execSummary:
Ronald Albert Kavitz was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Ronald Albert Kavitz was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald Albert Kavitz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Minot. ADA:   Kevin Gehler   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski   DF:  Ronald Albert Kavitz appeared from jail. Agent Engel appeared via phone. Includes SEH on 13CM542 and STC on 14CF387. Case called at 2:47 pm. On 13CM542, ADA Gehler makes statement. The state recommends 6 months jail. Atty Kucinski makes statement. ADA Gehler responds. R. Kavitz makes statement. Court orders: 75 Days jail. Credit for 43 Days. 20 Days to appeal. km

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Drost, Clerk: Webb. ADA:  Michael Nieskes  DF ATTY:  John Kucinski  DF: Ronald Albert Kavitz appeared from jail.  Court called at 9:25 a.m.  Includes case 13CM542 & 14CF387.  Court transfers case 13CM542 & 14CF387 to Branch 4. Attorneys will schedule SEH on 13CM542 & STC on 14CF387 with the Judicial Assistant.  Court adjourned at 9:26 a.m. lw
Status conference on October 9, 2014 at 09:15 am.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Michael Nieskes & Alexis McKinley,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Ronald Albert Kavitz appeared from jail. Judge Lundell sends this file to follow w/SRN.  Status conference scheduled for October 9, 2014 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on September 19, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Ronald Albert Kavitz does not appear from jail. SCSO states he is out on medical.  Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on September 17, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Michael E. Nieskes,  DF ATTY:  John Kucinski,  DF:  Ronald Albert Kavitz appeared from jail.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Defendant has not been picked up from MN. Defendant is currently serving a balance of 60 days on Sentence after Revocation.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 17, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
signed by HWC & Def. this date. eif
Bail/bond hearing on September 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Michael E. Nieskes,  DF ATTY:  Ashley J. Morse,  DF:  Ronald Albert Kavitz appeared from jail. Defendant has a felony warrant out of Scott County MN. Defendant waives extradition. Court questions Defendant.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
